item.title: Inside Oscar nominees luncheon with MM Keeravani, Guneet Monga, Shaunak Sen, Tom Cruise, Steven Spielberg. See pics
item.description: The Oscar nominees luncheon was held at the Beverly Hilton, where Indiaâ€™s MM Keeravani, Guneet Monga, Kartiki Gonsalves and Shaunak Sen also marked their presence.

item.title: The Flash trailer: Ben Affleck, Michael Keaton return as Batman; Ezra Miller tries to reset the universe. Watch
item.description: The Flash trailer: Ezra Miller gets his standalone feature as the superhero and tries getting advice from two different Batmans, played by Ben Affleck and Michael Keaton, when he travels back in time. The eagerly awaited film will be released on June 16, 2023.

item.title: Blake Lively shares new pics, confirms she and Ryan Reynolds welcomed fourth child: 'Been busy'
item.description: Actor Blake Lively put up a new Instagram photograph of herself with husband Ryan Reynolds and her mother-in-law. She wore a black tank top, minus a baby bump, and shared that she had 'been busy'.
